questions.questionText: What is the purpose of the 'const' keyword in C?
options: To declare a variable that can store any data type
To declare a variable whose value cannot be changed after initialization
To define a function that does not return any value
To include external libraries in the code

questions.questionText: Which of the following is NOT a valid integer literal in C?
Which data type is used to store single characters in C?
What is the purpose of the 'scanf()' function in C?
options: To print formatted output to the console
To read formatted input from the console
